string.name: pref_cat_general
string.comment: name of the general preference category

string.name: pref_cat_sync
string.comment: title of the sync preferences category

resources.string: Javobni kiritish uchun karta ichidagi matn kiritish maydonidan foydalanish
Barcha dastalar uchun til taqsimotini qayta tiklash (nutq sintezatori va lugʻatlar uchun)
Media fayllar nomlarini karta brauzeri savol/javob maydonlarida koʻrsatish
Tizim panellarini va javob tugmalarini yashirish
Javob berish va kartalarni tahrirlash kabi amallarga qoʻl ishoralarni belgilang.
Ekran burchaklarida bosish ishoralariga ruxsat berish
Ekranning istalgan joyidan oʻngga surilganda navigatsiya tortmasini ochish

string.name: gestures_none
string.comment: No gestures

resources.string: Agar siz eReader bilan aylanma masofani ikki baravar oshirishni istasangiz, buni yoqing
Agar ovoz fayli kiritilmagan boʻlsa, savol va javobni oʻqib beradi
Agar oxirgi sinxronlash 10 daqiqadan oldinroq amalga oshirilgan boʻlsa, ilovani ishga tushirish/chiqish vaqtida avtomatik sinxronlash.

string.name: sync_media_always
string.comment: Option to always fetch media when syncing

resources.string: Oʻzgarishlarni yuklash mumkin boʻlganda sinxronlash belgisini oʻzgartirish
Agar oʻchirilgan boʻlsa, tarifli ulanishda sinxronlashga harakat qilsangiz, siz ogohlantirilasiz

string.name: notification_minimum_cards_due
string.comment: Consider keeping the unbreakable space after the digit

resources.string: Qurilma renderi tezroq, lekin muammolarga duch kelishi mumkin, xususan, Android 8/8.1ʼda. Agar siz kartani takrorlash foydalanuvchi interfeysi qismlarini koʻrmasangiz, ushbu sozlamani sinab koʻring.
Barcha animatsiyalarni oʻchiriladi va kartalarni chizish uchun xavfsizroq usuldan foydalaniladi. E-ink qurilmalari buni talab qilishi mumkin.
Albom (gorizontal) rejimida \'Boʻshliqni toʻldirish\' kontekst menyusini yoqish
Kartalar tarkibini vertikal ravishda markazga tekislash
Agar bu vaqt oʻtmagan boʻlsa, javob tugmasini ikkinchi marta bosish eʼtiborga olinmaydi. Bu tasodifiy ikki marta bosishni oldini oladi
Javob koʻrsatish uchun uzoq bosish vaqti
Javobni koʻrsatish tugmasi bosishni aniqlaguncha bosishning minimal vaqti
Javob tugmalarida keyingi takrorlash vaqtini koʻrsatish
Kartalar soni, javob vaqti, bayroq va belgini yuqorigi panelda koʻrsatish

plurals.name: day_offset_summ
plurals.comment: %d is going to be replaced with the number of hours past midnight. It can be replaced if something else suits better the translation

item.comment: Consider keeping the unbreakable space after the digit
Consider keeping the unbreakable space after the digit

resources.string: Boshqa ilovalarga AnkiDroidʼga ulanishib sizning aralashuvingizsiz maʼlumotlarni oʻqish/yozishga ruxsat berish
Ilova panelida qaysi amallar koʻrsatilishini moslashtiring
Lugʻatlar, yordamchi dasturlar kabi AnkiDroid APIʼdan foydalanadigan ilovalar roʻyxatini koʻrish.

string.name: pref_controls_reviews_tab
string.comment: Name of the tab to configure controls for the reviews screen

string.name: pref_controls_previews_tab
string.comment: Name of the tab to configure controls for the previews screen

string.name: toggle_backside_only
string.comment: Control setting that toggles \'Backside only\' in the previews screen

resources.string: Orqaga qaytish/chiqish uchun \"Orqaga\" tugmasini ikki marta bosish
Oʻrganish ekranini yoki ilovani tasodifan tark etmaslik uchun
Barcha media fayllar importiga ruxsat berish

string.name: custom_sync_server_summary_none_of_the_two_servers_used
string.comment: This summary is shown when neither of the two custom sync servers are used, which is the default.

resources.string: AnkiWeb bilan sinxronlashga muqobil sifatida, sinxronlash uchun oʻz serveringizdan foydalanishingiz mumkin. Agar sozlanmagan boʻlsa, oʻrniga birlamchi AnkiWeb serveri ishlatiladi. Batafsil maʼlumot

string.name: card
string.comment: Generic term to refer to a card

string.name: deck_conf_general
string.comment: Label of the submenu for the general options of new deck

string.name: deck_conf_cram_search
string.comment: Label of a text field that contains a search query.

string.name: deck_conf_cram_reschedule
string.comment: Title of the box labelled by deck_conf_cram_reschedule_summ

resources.string: Ushbu dastadagi javoblarim asosida kartalarni qayta rejalashtirish
Kechikishlar soniyalarda. 0 kartani asl dastaga qaytaradi.
Dasturchilarga odamlar qaysi funksiyalardan foydalanayotganligini koʻrishga yordam berish orqali AnkiDroidʼga hissa qoʻshishingiz mumkin

Qayd muharririda
belgilari kartani tahrirlayotganda yangi qatorlarga oʻgiriladi.
Oʻrganish ekranida ‘javobni kiritish’ maydoniga avtomatik tarzda oʻtish
Bular ilovamizga hissa qoʻshgan ajoyib odamlar. Siz ham AnkiDroidʼga dasturlash, tarjima qilish, ehson qilish va boshqa yoʻllar orqali yordam berishingiz mumkin!
AnkiDroid GPL-3.0 va AGPL-3.0 litsenziyalari ostida chiqarilgan, manba kodi GitHubda mavjud
AnkiDroid shuningdek, turli xil ochiq manba litsenziyalar ostida litsenziyalangan uchinchi tomon kutubxonalari va piktogrammalaridan foydalanadi.
Xayriya qilish orqali AnkiDroidʼni rivojini qoʻllab-quvvatlashingiz mumkin. Miqdori qancha boʻlishidan qatʼiy nazar, chuqur minnatdorchilik bildiramiz.

string.name: display_binding_card_side_question
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the question

string.name: display_binding_card_side_answer
string.comment: When displaying a key bind on a preference this formatter is used if the bind only applies to the answer

string.name: binding_remove_binding
string.comment: The parameter is the name of the key/gesture. Keys cannot be translated yet.

resources.string: AnkiDroid boshqa Anki mijozlari bilan mos tushadigan va koʻproq ovozlar va tilni ijro etish uchun takomillashtirishlarni oʻz ichiga olgan yaxshiroq nutq sintezatori mexanizmini taqdim etdi!\n\nImkon qadar tezroq yangilang, chunki bu sozlama tez orada oʻchiriladi.
Iltimos, yangi nutq sintezatori formatiga yangilang
Oʻrganish ekranida belgilangan server portidan foydalangan JavaScript localStorage funksiyasini yoqadi

Iltimos, dasturchi parametrlarini yoqishdan oldin ishonch hosil qiling. Bu parametrlar xavfli boʻlib, ilovani yoki toʻplamingizni buzishi mumkin.\n\nEsda tutingki, bu parametrlar koʻpchilik foydalanuvchilar uchun moʻljallanmagan va shuning uchun tarjima qilinmaydi, shuning uchun ular ingliz tilida.

AnkiDroid vaqti-vaqti bilana toʻplamingizni zaxiralaydi. Agar zaxira nusxalari ikki kundan oshgan boʻlsa, AnkiDroid diskda boʻsh joy boʻshatish uchun ularni baʻzilarini oʻchirib tashlaydi.

Eʼtibor bering, media fayllar zaxiralanmaydi. Amin boʻlish uchun toʻplamingizni vaqti-vaqti bilan sinxronlang yoki uni zaxira nusxalarini eksport qiling.

Dastalar roʻyxati menyusida, zaxiradan qayta tiklashingiz va toʻplamingizni eksport qilishingiz mumkin.

string.name: pref__widget_text__error
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating a generic error. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__widget_text__calculating
string.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, indicating that the value, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

plurals.name: pref__widget_text__n_files_n_bytes
plurals.comment: Text in a small box on the end of a preference, showing some statistics about a folder on disk if a form of “12 files\n26 MB”. Must be VERY short. Can be one or two lines.

string.name: pref__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: _ bilan boshlanmagan va hech qanday qaydga havola qilinmagan rasmlar va boshqa media fayllarni oʻchirish

string.name: dialog__delete_unused_media_files__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can select unused media files to delete

string.name: pref__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Preference title

string.name: dialog__delete_backups__title
string.comment: Title for a dialog where you can choose backups to delete

string.name: pref__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Toʻplam, media fayllar va zaxiralarni oʻchirish. Ilova sozlamalari oʻchirilmaydi.

string.name: dialog__delete_collection__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_collection__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. When the collection is deleted, we exit the process, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Rostdan ham toʻplamingiz, media fayllaringiz va zaxiralaringiz oʻchirmoqchimisiz?\n\nQayd: bu amal oynani yopadi.

string.name: pref__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Toʻplam, media fayllar zaxiralar va sozlamalarni oʻchirish

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_everything__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Rostdan ham barcha maʼlumotlarni oʻchirmoqchimisiz? Bunga toʻplamingiz, media fayllaringiz, zaxiralaringiz va sozlamalaringiz ham kiradi.\n\nQayd: bu amal oynani yopadi.

string.name: pref__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Preference title

resources.string: Sozlamalar va boshqa ilova maʼlumotlarini oʻchirish

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__title
string.comment: Confirmation dialog title

string.name: dialog__delete_app_data__message
string.comment: “Close the window” here refers to the activity that the user is currently seeing. Deleting app data forcibly closes AnkiDroid, which closes the activity without animation. On some devices the entire settings app may be closed. User might not realize that this activity comes directly from AnkiDroid, so it might be wise to avoid words such as “AnkiDroid or “app”.

resources.string: Rostdan ham ilova maʼlumotlarini oʻchirib tashlamoqchimisiz? Sozlamalar va boshqa ilova maʼlumotlari oʻchiriladi.\n\nEslatma: bu amal oynani yopadi.

string.name: pref__etc__summary__fetching
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when the value is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__summary__no_collection
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when a preference is not usable because the collection does not exist

string.name: pref__etc__summary__error
string.comment: Generic preference summary to be shown when there was an error fetching the value. For example, this is shown when the permission to access collection is lacking

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__fetching
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which is being fetched

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__calculating
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference, the value of which, such as folder size on disk, is being calculated

string.name: pref__etc__snackbar__no_collection
string.comment: Generic snackbar message to be shown when user taps on a preference that is not usable because the collection does not exist

string.name: hide_system_bars
string.comment: Title of a setting that allows to hide the system bars

string.name: hide_system_bars_none
string.comment: Setting option to not hide any of the system bars

string.name: hide_system_bars_status_bar
string.comment: Setting option to hide the system status bar (the top one with clock, battery status, etc)

string.name: hide_system_bars_navigation_bar
string.comment: Setting option to hide the system navigation bar (the bottom one that can go back, to home, etc)

string.name: hide_system_bars_all_bars
string.comment: Setting option to hide all the system bars

string.name: reviewer_frame_style_card
string.comment: Style name of the \'Card\' card frame of the Study Screen

string.name: reviewer_frame_style_box
string.comment: Style name of the \'Box\' card frame of the Study Screen

string.name: reviewer_toolbar_top
string.comment: Setting to put the toolbar on the top of the study screen

string.name: reviewer_toolbar_bottom
string.comment: Setting to put the toolbar on the bottom of the study screen

string.name: reviewer_toolbar_none
string.comment: Setting to remove the toolbar from the study screen

resources.string: Oʻrganish ekrani takomillashtirildi va joriy ekranni almashtiradi. Eski ekranning baʼzi xususiyatlari oʻzgartirildi yoki oʻchirildi. Iltimos, fikr-mulohazalaringiz yoki baglar haqida xabar bering.

string.name: open_settings
string.comment: Description of the shortcut that opens the app settings
